title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Launchers in Lebanon: No Casualties Reported”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF continues to carry out attacks within Lebanese territory; launchers that were used to carry out launches towards the Metula and Ma’ayan Baruch areas were targeted earlier today.

An IDF force attacked the launcher from which launches were made towards the Metula area earlier today. In addition, fighter jets attacked a launcher belonging to the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Houla area, which had launched rockets towards Ma’ayan Baruch earlier today. Furthermore, fighter jets attacked a military structure in which a member of the organization was operating in the Ayta ash-Shab area.

Following the alerts activated at 3:30 PM in Kiryat Shmona, about ten launches that crossed from Lebanese territory were detected; most were intercepted, and there are no casualties.

Attached is documentation from the attack on the launcher from which launches were made towards the Ma’ayan Baruch area: https://bit.ly/3S6rk0r
